content.preview_text: {{#is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} We had an issue when attempting delivery to your home. {{else is attributes.order_type 'SDD'}}We had an issue when attempting delivery to your home. {{else is attributes.order_type 'SDD-Mixed'}}We had an issue when attempting delivery to your home. {{else}} Order #{{order_number}} could not be delivered. It was canceled. You will not be charged. You may be able to re-order. See more details here. {{/is}}

Your refund is on its way. {{else}} {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Your order couldn't be delivered, so it was canceled. {{else is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} We had an issue when attempting to deliver your OTC Health Solutions order. {{else}} {{#if (itemFlagFinder current_shipment.order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}} Your order couldn't be delivered, so it was canceled {{else if items_being_processed}} Part of your order couldn't be delivered, so it was canceled {{else if multi_shipment}} Part of your order couldn't be delivered, so it was canceled {{else}} Your order couldn't be delivered, so it was canceled {{/if}} {{/is}} {{/is}}
{{#is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} Order #{{attributes.display_order_number}} could not be delivered. {{else}} Order #{{order_number}} could not be delivered. {{/is}}

Your account will be refunded.
We're sorry for the inconvenience. {{#if (itemFlagFinder current_shipment.order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}}
You can call the pharmacy at {{{attributes.rx_phone_number}}} to reorder your prescription. {{/if}}
Shipment details

Need to return a store item?
No problem. Just show this barcode at the register when making your in-store return. See our return policy.
{{{{/raw}}}}
custom.legal:
{{{{raw}}}}
{{#is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} The fastest and easiest way to place an order is online. To find your plan, visit: {{{attributes.web_url}}}.

You received this email to confirm the action noted above. You can view the OTC Health Solutions privacy in the footer of your plan's webpage. For any additional questions about your OTC Health Solutions order, contact us at: {{{attributes.phone_number}}}.

{{else}} You received this email to confirm the action noted above. Your email address will not be saved or used for any other purpose unless you chose to sign up for special email offers when you registered. You can change your email preference in My Account at any time. We value your privacy and the security of personal information and never give or sell any specific information about you to any manufacturer or direct marketers. If you have questions or concerns about how we protect your privacy, read our Privacy Policy.

{{#unless (itemFlagFinder current_shipment.order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}} You can check the status of your order in the {{#if (itemFlagFinder current_shipment.order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}} Order Status and History {{else}} Order Status and History {{/if}} section of your account. {{/unless}} If you have any questions about your shipment, please email customercare@cvs.com or call 1-888-607-4287. {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Please note that at-home COVID-19 tests are nonrefundable. {{/is}}

{{/is}} ©Copyright CVS.com
One CVS Drive, Woonsocket, RI 02895
{{{{/raw}}}}
